groups.label: Data Persistence
groups.description: Central storage for all workflow outputs, including product data, competitor insights, generated copy, AI images/videos, and shop builds. Supports retrieval and downstream processing.

groupEdges.label: Product discovery data from ad and marketplace sources flows into validation and planning pipelines.
Validated product insights are passed into planning for strategic shop setup.
Planned product data, customer profiles, and competitive insights guide shop creation and ad generation.
Shop assets such as copy and visuals feed into ad generation for cohesive branding.
All stages store and retrieve structured outputs: data, assets, models in the central persistence layer.

services.label: GetHookd Top Performing Product Ads
services.description: Fetches product metadata from GetHookd website including product titles, prices, ratings, reviews, and seller information. Runs the data through a vision model to do a quick check on the product: rejects items that are too large (shipping issues) or require a software app (too complex).

functions.name: GetHookd API
functions.description: Fetch all ads data via API

output.name: Raw Ad Data
output.description: Raw, unfiltered data from the API.

functions.name: Cerebras Validator
functions.description: Validates ad data to ensure it is a physical product without a software app, then uses the images to ensure they are physically not too large

output.name: Valid Ad Indices
output.description: The indices of valid ads based on product criteria.

input.name: GetHookd Parameter Object
input.description: Filter products by Gethookd website filters

properties.name: performanceRating
properties.description: The minimum performance rating to filter products by (e.g., '5 stars', '4.5 stars').

properties.name: timeframe
properties.description: The time period within which the product data was collected or is relevant (e.g., 'within last month', 'last 6 months').

properties.name: minPrice
properties.description: The minimum price (inclusive) of the product to filter by.

properties.name: maxPrice
properties.description: The maximum price (inclusive) of the product to filter by.

properties.name: category
properties.description: The specific product category to filter (e.g., 'fishing rods', 'lures', 'reels').

output.name: Ad metadata
output.description: Ad metadata (description / text)

properties.name: adDescription
properties.description: A brief, compelling description or summary of the product suitable for an advertisement or search result snippet.

properties.name: productTitle
properties.description: The full, official name or title of the product.

properties.name: price
properties.description: The current price of the product.

properties.name: rating
properties.description: The average numerical rating of the product (e.g., 4.5 out of 5).

properties.name: reviewsCount
properties.description: The total number of customer reviews submitted for the product.

properties.name: imageURL
properties.description: The URL link to the main image of the product.

properties.name: associatedShop
properties.description: The name of the online store, vendor, or shop where the product is sold.
